title: Building Your Base—The Foundation of Control
subtitle: No empire is built on sand. The first commandment of power: secure unwavering loyalty. Affection is fleeting, but calculated alliances endure. Identify the discontented, the overlooked, the ambitious—bind them to you with promises, rewards, and fear. In the modern world, your base is your shield and your sword; without it, you are nothing but prey.

images.caption: A dark, medieval fortress surrounded by loyal followers, banners raised.
